verses.roman:
jagadānanda kahe prabhura dhariyā caraṇa
"pūrva haite icchā mora yāite vṛndāvana

synonyms: jagadānanda—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; kahe—said; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dhariyā caraṇa—grasping the lotus feet; pūrva haite—for a very long time; icchā—desire; mora—my; yāite vṛndāvana—to go to Vṛndāvana.
translation: Grasping the Lord's feet, Jagadānanda Paṇḍita then said, "For a long time I have desired to go to Vṛndāvana.
